name: FirstQuadrant
description: Sales AI that helps founders and revenue teams move faster, stay organized, and close more deals, by streamlining the behind-the-scenes sales-work so nothing ever slips through the cracks.
label: Maximize B2B sales with human-centered AI
label_zh: 最大化B2B销售，借助以人为本的AI
content_zh: FirstQuadrant 是一款销售 AI 工具，帮助创始人和销售团队提高效率、保持组织有序，并促成更多交易。它通过简化后台销售工作，确保每个细节都不被遗漏。

name: Sked
description: Sked lets you schedule, reschedule, and manage meetings directly in Slack. No switching tabs. No back-and-forth. Just faster scheduling where work already happens.
label: Schedule meetings inside Slack. Fast.
content_zh: Sked 让你直接在 Slack 中安排、重新安排和管理会议。无需切换标签页，无需来回沟通，只需在工作已经进行的地方更快地安排会议。

name: Agentic Testing by Testsigma
description: Test Management by Testsigma puts AI agents in the hands of QA teams throughout the testing lifecycle - analyzing requirements, generating test cases and test steps, executing tests, tracking progress, and generating detailed bug reports.
label: AI agents create and run tests from specs & designs
label_zh: AI 代理根据规格和设计创建并运行测试
content_zh: Testsigma 的 Agentic Testing 将 AI 代理交到 QA 团队手中，贯穿整个测试生命周期。它可以帮助分析需求、生成测试用例和步骤、执行测试、跟踪进度并生成详细的 bug 报告。

name: Bugster
description: Transform user flows into automated tests instantly. AI-powered testing solution that helps developers ship bug-free software faster.
label: Software testing agent
content_zh: 将用户流程立即转换为自动化测试。这款由AI驱动的测试工具帮助开发者更快地交付无bug的软件。

name: Granola for iOS
description: Trusted by top founders, VCs and recruiters - Granola is now available on your iPhone.Stay present and capture conversations on-the-go with Granola for iPhone - perfect for coffee catch‑ups, conference days or just distilling your thoughts.
label: The AI notepad for people in back-to-back meetings
label_zh: 适用于连续会议的人工智能记事本
content_zh: 深受顶级创始人、风险投资人和招聘人员信赖的Granola现已登陆iPhone。使用Granola for iOS，您可以随时随地记录对话，无论是咖啡闲聊、会议日程还是整理思绪，都能轻松应对。

name: Migma AI
description: Go from a simple prompt to a complete, on-brand email in seconds. Migma fetches live content, generates images, and ensures your emails look perfect everywhere. Once created, choose your audience and hit send. 200x cheaper and faster.
label: Create on-brand emails in seconds
label_zh: 几秒钟内创建符合品牌形象的电子邮件
content_zh: 从简单的提示到完整的品牌邮件，只需几秒钟。Migma AI 可以获取实时内容，生成图片，并确保你的邮件在任何地方都看起来完美。创建完成后，选择你的受众并发送。成本和时间比传统方式节省200倍。

name: Making Today
description: Making Today is your command center to get things done. Create dashboards to manage work, projects, trips, or focus. Organize everything in one place: events, meetings, emails, notes, tasks, links, files, Jira tickets, and more. Work smarter, not scattered.
label: Stay Organized and Get more done!
label_zh: 保持井井有条，事半功倍！
content_zh: Making Today 是你的指挥中心，帮助你高效完成任务。你可以创建仪表盘来管理工作、项目、旅行或专注事项。将所有内容集中在一个地方：日程、会议、邮件、笔记、任务、链接、文件、Jira 工单等。让你的工作更加智能，不再杂乱无章。

name: EasySketch
description:
Just draw a rough idea and click a button. We turn your quick, imperfect sketches into beautiful:
- thumbnails 
- graphs
- illustrations.
No subscription necessary.
label: Turn rough-sketches into beautiful graphics!
label_zh: 将粗糙的草图变成精美的图形！
content_zh:
只需画出一个大概的想法，然后点击按钮。我们就能将你快速、不完美的草图变成精美的：
- 缩略图
- 图表
- 插图
无需订阅。

name: BuildShip Tools
description: Build MCP-ready tools for your AI agents - just by prompting! Get a visual logic flow of the tool instead of a large code blob. Tweak, test, and perfect your tool’s logic, on an infinite low-code canvas. Host the tool instantly or export the code to self-host.
label: Vibe-code MCP-ready tools for any AI Agent
label_zh:
氛围代码：适用于任何AI代理的MCP就绪工具

直译后重新意译：
氛围代码：适用于任何AI助手的MCP就绪工具
content_zh: 为你的AI代理构建MCP就绪的工具——只需通过提示即可！你将获得工具的可视化逻辑流程，而不是一大段代码。在一个无限的低代码画布上调整、测试和完善你的工具逻辑。你可以立即托管工具，或将代码导出以自行托管。

name: Interviewiz
description: An AI tool designed to level up your interview skills with conversational video avatars, job-specific questions generated from real job descriptions, a comprehensive mock interview library, and actionable, performance-based feedback — available anytime, 24/7
label: Tailored AI mock interviews with video avatars
label_zh: 量身定制的AI模拟面试，配有视频头像
content_zh: Interviewiz 是一款专为提升面试技巧设计的 AI 工具，提供对话式视频虚拟人、根据真实职位描述生成的职位相关问题、全面的模拟面试库以及基于表现的实用反馈。这款工具全天候 24/7 可用，随时帮助你提升面试技能。

name: Matter AI
description: Matter AI is open-source AI Code Reviewer Agent enables developers to review code changes focused on bugs, security vulnerabilities and performance issues.
label: AI Code reviewer to fix bugs, security & performance issues
label_zh: AI 代码审查工具，修复 bug、安全和性能问题
content_zh: Matter AI 是一个开源的 AI 代码审查工具，帮助开发者专注于检查代码中的错误、安全漏洞和性能问题。

name: Gleo AI
description: Replay conversations wishing you'd handled high-stakes moments better? 🤔 Practice negotiations, interviews, sales & much more with Gleo AI, your personal AI coach. Get feedback on how you speak (clarity, tone, impact) & build confidence.
label: Your AI coach for confident communication
content_zh: 回想那些关键时刻，你是否希望自己表现得更好？🤔 用Gleo AI来练习谈判、面试、销售等技能吧，它就是你的私人AI教练。它可以给你提供关于说话清晰度、语气和影响力等方面的反馈，帮助你建立自信。

name: GoBuildMy.App
description: Build native iOS and Android apps by just chatting. Turn your ideas into apps in seconds. Connect APIs with just a few prompts, create MVPs in minutes instead of days or design apps together with your clients. All the code is backed-up automatically to GitHub!
label: Build native mobile apps by chatting.
label_zh: 通过聊天构建原生移动应用。
content_zh: 通过聊天就能构建原生的iOS和Android应用，几秒钟内将你的想法变成应用程序。只需几个简单的提示就能连接API，几分钟内就能创建出最小可行产品（MVP），而不需要几天的时间，或者与客户一起设计应用。所有代码都会自动备份到GitHub！

name: VoltAgent
description: VoltAgent is an open source TypeScript framework for building and orchestrating AI agents, with built-in observability. Escape the limitations of no-code builders and the complexity of starting from scratch.
label: Build TS AI agents with n8n-style observability
label_zh: 构建具有 n8n 风格可观测性的 TS AI 代理
content_zh: VoltAgent 是一个开源的 TypeScript 框架，用于构建和编排 AI 代理，并内置了可观测性功能。它既摆脱了无代码构建工具的限制，又避免了从零开始构建的复杂性。

name: CheatGPT
description:
Access premium AI models (o4 Mini, Gemini 2.5 Pro, Grok & more) at affordable prices. CheatGPT offers specialized learning tools, and cost-effective subscription plans. Try our free tier today!
Affiliate program 30% 👇🏻
label: Your all-in-one AI cheat code for exams, studying & more
label_zh: 你的全能AI考试和学习秘籍
content_zh:
访问高质量的AI模型（如o4 Mini、Gemini 2.5 Pro、Grok等），价格实惠。CheatGPT提供专业的学习工具和经济实惠的订阅计划。今天就来试试我们的免费版本吧！
联盟计划30%👇🏻
